php.LBL_SMSNOTIFIER: Cấu hình nhà cung cấp SMS
php.LBL_CALLBACK_ADDRESSES_DESC:
In order to generate callback addresses for SMS communication, it is necessary to first create a webservice connection for SMS.
The following URLs must be entered in the callback section directly at the provider.
php.FL_CALLBACK_URL_FOR_REPORT_DESC: URL for delivery reports. To be entered directly at the provider.
php.FL_CALLBACK_URL_FOR_REPLY_DESC: URL for receptions. To be entered directly at the provider.
php.LBL_SELECTED_PROVIDER_NOT_ACTIVE: Selected provider is inactive. Activate it or change the provider.

js.LBL_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa cấu hình này?
js.JS_RECORD_DELETED_SUCCESSFULLY: Cấu hình đã được gỡ bỏ thành công
